Name: InFlux
About the game: InFlux is a puzzle game that mixes exploration and platforming in a series of beautiful natural and abstract environments. You are a mysterious metal sphere which falls from the sky, traversing an apparently deserted island dotted with cubic structures of glass and steel. Each glasshouse is a puzzle to be solved. Key Features Sit in a comfy chair and become as relaxed as you have ever been while playing a video game Solve a series of mind-bending cubic puzzle structures connected by... A series of beautiful, naturalistic hub world environments to roll around Meet a majestic and enigmatic humpback whale Works great with keyboard and mouse or your Xbox 360 controller A completely original soundtrack by musical genius Jonathan Yandel
